Package ch.bfh.roboticsLab.yellow

The package ch.bfh.roboticsLab.yellow is a collection of classes to interact with the Yellow robot from a remote device through a WiFi connection.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SerialClient
    This class connects to a Yellow robot server and offers methods to read and write messages to and from the robot.
    SerialEncoder
    This class allows to encode and decode byte arrays to be handled through a serial (UART) interface.
    Telemetry
    This class holds a Yellow telemetry packet in a Java object.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SerialEncoder.ReadState
    State of read buffer.

Package ch.bfh.roboticsLab.yellow Description

The package ch.bfh.roboticsLab.yellow is a collection of classes to interact with the Yellow robot from a remote device through a WiFi connection.

See the documentation about the individual classes for more information.
